participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: Tom is friendly and enjoys sharing stories from his past. He has a nurturing side stemming from his teaching days.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i'm a retired gym teacher. i like watching war documentaries. i was poor growing up.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Mike is caring and supportive, often putting his family's needs before his own. He has a good sense of humor and enjoys discussing different movie genres.
participant_2.background: i spent a decade working in the human services field. i am a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. i have a son who is in junior high school.
